author: TravisEz13
body: move here strings in packaging module to psd1 file for easier maintenance of strings and code

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body: @lzybkr I moved the psd1 out of a local specific folder, does that address your concern?

comments.author: lzybkr
comments.body: You still use `Import-LocalizedData` - remove that and my concerns are addressed.

comments.author: TravisEz13
comments.body:
I filed #4337 for a fix to PowerShell, which won't help here as this script needs to run down level as well.
@lzybkr I added `Import-Data` which does almost the same thing as `Import-LocalizedData` but with out the localized file look-up

comments.author: daxian-dbw
comments.body:
All comments have been addressed, so I'm about to merge this PR.
@TravisEz13 Since `Import-PowerShellDataFile` is the command to import a .psd1 file, I think #4337 probably should be closed. Please re-open the issue if you think otherwise.

title: move packaging string to psd1 file
